verses.name: Jeremiah 26:6
verses.text: Then will I make this house like Shiloh, and will make this city a curse to all the nations of the earth.

verses.name: Jeremiah 26:7
verses.text: So the priests and the prophets and all the people heard Jeremiah speaking these words in the house of the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 26:8
verses.text: Now it came to pass, when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking all that the Lord had commanded him to speak unto all the people, that the priests and the prophets and all the people took him, saying, Thou shalt surely die.
